PSYC 575 Multilevel Modeling (2022 Fall)

This is the course website for PSYC 575 in the 2022 Fall semester. The course follows a flipped course model so that students will review assigned readings and prerecorded lecture videos at their own time, while the class meeting time will be dedicated to software demonstration, Q&A, and exercises. You will find the syllabus, lecture materials, and R codes in the navigation bar at the top.

Guide to navigate the course
  • Syllabus, lecture videos, R code: This course website
  • Homework/exercise instruction and submission: Blackboard
  • Course announcement, additional readings: Slack
  • Q & A: Slack
  • The lecture videos are licensed under the standard YouTube License
  • Code content is licensed under the MIT license
  • Other course materials are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License
